Name: Columbia Glacier Cruiser Board
Description: A stable, medium-flex snowboard that excels on groomers and variable terrain with quick edge-to-edge response and a comfortable ride.

Name: Blue Burton Powder Panther Board
Description: A powerful, directional snowboard with a tapered shape and rocker nose for floatation and stability in deep powder.

Name: Nordica Ice Queen Board
Description: A women's-specific snowboard with a softer flex and camber profile for effortless turns and playful riding.

Name: Spyder Backcountry Beast Board
Description: A stiff, aggressive snowboard with a rockered nose and flat tail for stability and maneuverability in steep, technical terrain.

Name: Mammut All-Terrain Assassin Board
Description: A cambered, medium-stiff snowboard that dominates on all types of terrain, from park to powder to steeps.

Name: Mammut Retro Ripper Board
Description: A classic-inspired snowboard with a wide waist and flat base for a surfy, old-school feel and maximum stability.

Name: Nordica Summit Seeker Hat
Description: A warm, fleece-lined beanie with a classic look and a fold-up cuff for extra coverage.

Name: Yellow Spyder Alpine Ace Hat
Description: A lightweight, moisture-wicking hat with a snug fit and a reflective logo for added visibility.

Name: Grey Spyder Powder Puff Hat
Description: A fluffy, faux-fur pom-pom beanie with a chunky knit and a playful, feminine style.

Name: Nordica Glacier Gnome Hat
Description: A thick, cable-knit hat with a pom-pom and ear flaps for extra warmth in cold conditions.

Name: Burton Nordic Noggin Hat
Description: A snug, fleece-lined hat with a traditional Nordic pattern and a pom-pom for a touch of whimsy.

Name: Red Mammut Snowstorm Stalker Hat
Description: A waterproof, windproof hat with a built-in neck gaiter and a brim to keep snow and wind out of your face.

Name: Mammut Avalanche Avenger Hat
Description: A heavy-duty, insulated hat with ear flaps and a face mask for extreme cold and high-wind conditions.

Name: Columbia Après-Ski Artist Hat
Description: A colorful, patterned beanie with a slouchy fit and a fun, playful vibe, perfect for post-slope hangouts.

Name: Nordica Glacier Grip Gloves
Description: A waterproof, insulated glove with a textured palm for superior grip in icy conditions, reinforced fingers for durability, and a soft, moisture-wicking lining for comfort.

Name: Brown Nordica Powder Paws Gloves
Description: A warm, breathable glove with a leather palm and a touchscreen-compatible finger, designed for the tech-savvy skier or snowboarder.

Name: Green Columbia Freeride Fury Gloves
Description: A flexible, articulated glove with a softshell outer layer and a plush, moisture-wicking liner for a comfortable, ergonomic fit.

Name: Striped Columbia Park Prodigy Gloves
Description: A low-profile, slim-fitting glove with a stretchy neoprene outer layer and a grippy, silicone-coated palm for maximum dexterity and control.

Name: Red Mammut Alpine Armor Gloves
Description: A waterproof, windproof glove with a reinforced leather palm and knuckle guard, designed for maximum protection and durability in harsh alpine conditions.

Name: Grey Mammut Nordic Ninja Gloves
Description: A lightweight, stretchy glove with a silicone palm and a touchscreen-compatible finger, perfect for cross-country skiing or snowshoeing.

Name: Christmas Burton Snowstorm Sentinel Gloves
Description: A breathable, insulated glove with a waterproof membrane, a long gauntlet cuff, and a removable wrist leash for versatile use in all kinds of snowsports.

Name: Burton Après-Ski Aristocrat Gloves
Description: A stylish, insulated glove with a faux-fur cuff and a soft, luxurious lining, designed for comfort and elegance during post-slope relaxation.

Name: Black Spyder Backcountry Bomber Gloves
Description: A rugged, heavy-duty glove with a leather and nylon outer layer, a removable liner, and a gauntlet-style cuff for maximum warmth and protection in extreme conditions.

Name: Yellow Spyder Freeride Phenom Boots
Description: A stiff, aggressive ski boot with a customizable fit and a walk mode for hiking and touring.

Name: Red Spyder Park Pro Boots
Description: A soft-flexing ski boot with a wide toe box and a freestyle-inspired design, perfect for tricks and jumps in the park.

Name: Blue Spyder All-Mountain Ace Boots
Description: A versatile, medium-flex ski boot with a heat-moldable liner and a customizable shell for a personalized fit.

Name: Columbia Backcountry Boss Boots
Description: A lightweight, touring-specific ski boot with a rockered sole and a walk mode, designed for backcountry exploration.

Name: Columbia Racing Rocket Boots
Description: A stiff, high-performance ski boot with a snug, narrow fit and a responsive feel, designed for expert skiers.

Name: Green Burton Women's Wonder Boots
Description: A women's-specific ski boot with a lower cuff and a softer flex, designed to fit the unique anatomy of the female foot and leg.

Name: White Burton Junior Juggernaut Boots
Description: A kids' ski boot with a wide, comfortable fit and a soft flex, perfect for young skiers who are still learning.

Name: Blue Nordica Budget Beast Boots
Description: An affordable ski boot with a medium flex and a comfortable liner, perfect for entry-level skiers who are just starting out.

Name: White Nordica Big Mountain Crusher Boots
Description: A stiff, powerful ski boot with a hike mode and a heat-moldable liner, designed for expert skiers who want to conquer challenging terrain.

Name: Yellow Nordica Carving Connoisseur Boots
Description: A narrow, high-performance ski boot with a stiff flex and a race-inspired design, perfect for carving and high-speed skiing.

Name: Pink Mammut Powder Princess Boots
Description: A women's-specific ski boot with a wide toe box and a soft flex, designed for maximum comfort and control in deep powder.

Name: White Mammut Teen Titan Boots
Description: A ski boot designed specifically for teenagers, with a medium flex and a heat-moldable liner for a comfortable, customizable fit.

Name: Nordica Snowstorm Slayer Goggles
Description: A high-contrast ski goggle with a wide field of view and a versatile lens that adapts to changing light conditions.

Name: Blue Nordica Freeride Freak Goggles
Description: A sleek, frameless ski goggle with a polarized lens and a comfortable, helmet-compatible strap for all-day use.

Name: White Columbia Racing Radar Goggles
Description: A low-profile, aerodynamic ski goggle with a tinted, mirrored lens and a comfortable, no-slip fit for maximum speed and precision.

Name: Black Columbia Backcountry Bomber Goggles
Description: A durable, double-lensed ski goggle with a removable face mask and an anti-fog coating for all-weather protection.

Name: White Mammut Women's Wonder Goggles
Description: A women's-specific ski goggle with a smaller fit and a stylish, feminine design, perfect for female skiers.

Name: Mammut Junior Jet Goggles
Description: A kids' ski goggle with a comfortable, no-slip fit and a colorful, fun design that kids will love.

Name: Spyder Tech Titan Goggles
Description: A ski goggle with a built-in, Bluetooth-enabled headset for hands-free communication on the slopes.

Name: Yellow Burton Nighttime Ninja Goggles
Description: A ski goggle with a clear lens and built-in LED lights for enhanced visibility in low-light conditions.

Name: Pink Burton Photochromic Phantom Goggles
Description: A ski goggle with a lens that automatically adjusts to changing light conditions, so you always have the right amount of tint for optimal vision.

Name: Blue Nordica All-Mountain Ace Helmet
Description: A versatile ski helmet with a comfortable, adjustable fit and a removable lining for all-season use.

Name: Black Nordica  Backcountry Boss Helmet
Description: A lightweight, vented ski helmet with a removable ear pad and a goggle clip for backcountry expeditions.

Name: Yellow Spyder Racing Rocket Helmet
Description: A streamlined, aerodynamic ski helmet with a snug, low-profile fit and a removable chin guard for maximum speed and safety.

Name: Green Spyder Women's Wonder Helmet
Description: A women's-specific ski helmet with a stylish, feminine design and a removable liner for easy cleaning.

Name: Pink Mammut Junior Juggernaut Helmet
Description: A kids' ski helmet with a lightweight, durable construction and a comfortable, adjustable fit for growing heads.

Name: White Burton Freeride Freak Helmet
Description: A ski helmet with a unique, angular design and a removable visor for sunny days on the slopes.

Name: Black Burton Audio Ace Helmet
Description: A ski helmet with built-in speakers and a microphone, so you can listen to music and take calls without removing your helmet.

Name: Columbia Budget Beast Helmet
Description: An affordable ski helmet with a lightweight, in-mold construction and a comfortable, adjustable fit, perfect for entry-level skiers.
